title.rendered: INTECH lands mega project for providing corrosion inhibitor and solar skid packages for a major oil field in the Middle East

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH’s skid packages portfolio continues to impress leading oil & gas end users as it signs an agreement with a major oil & gas company to provide corrosion inhibitor and solar skid packages at one of the largest oil fields in the Middle East.

This project becomes another proud addition to a series of skid packages project wins which includes successful delivery of chemical injection skids and multi-year contract for pressure protection skids at major Middle Eastern oil fields. Over two decades of regional presence, combined with delivering robust and reliable solutions have propelled INTECH to being one of the leading providers of skid based packages in the region.

In view of its initiative of expanding production pads sustainably, the client wanted to protect flowlines and trunklines used to transport production fluids from wells to degassing station. INTECH will be providing 15+ zone 2 corrosion inhibitor injection skids with injection pumps; transfer pumps with redundant unloading pumps; and safe area solar skids with power backups & SIL 3 based controllers.

INTECH’s ready-to-operate skids offer portability, reusability, greater safety, and energy efficiency thus making it an ideal fit for the client’s ecosystem. The skids are fully customizable, as per customer requirements, for pipelines covering anti-corrosion, anti-foaming, and lubrication functions for upstream crude and raw gas operations.

About INTECH’s Chemical Injection skids

INTECH builds fully customizable and rapidly deployable injection skids covering anti-corrosion, anti-foaming, and lubrication functions for upstream crude and raw gas operations. Off-the-shelf or made-to-order, our skids can be set for any pressure, dosing, and volume requirements. Moreover, we can include dosing equipment, chemicals, and pumps from any vendors and configure them to your requirements. We follow ASME, API, and ISA standards, and our skids can be certified and tested to any third-party requirements.

For more information: https://www.intechww.com/skids-packages/chemical-injection-skids/

About INTECH

INTECH Automation & Intelligence is a globally renowned industrial automation & digitalization technology company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies resolve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As part of our promise of helping businesses evolve in the Industry 4.0 era, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
